column1: Daily Weather Observations for Armidale, New South Wales for April 2021
Prepared at 13:00 UTC on Wednesday 20 October 2021   IDCJDW2004.202104
Most observations from the Armidale Tree Group Nursery site in Mann Street, but some from Armidale Airport.
Temperature, humidity, cloud, evaporation and rainfall observations are from Armidale (Tree Group Nursery) {station 056037}
Wind and pressure observations are from Armidale Airport AWS {station 056238}
